mapper.select: SELECT content_type AS "content_type", data AS "data" FROM GENERAL_REF_DATA WHERE ref = #{ref}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO GENERAL_REF_DATA n USING ( VALUES (#{ref}, #{content_type}, #{data}) ) AS o ("REF", "CONTENT_TYPE", "DATA") ON o.ref = n.ref WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET n.content_type = o.content_type, n.data = o.data WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ref, content_type, data) VALUES (o.ref, o.content_type, o.data)
MERGE INTO GENERAL_REF_DATA (ref, content_type, data) KEY (ref) VALUE (#{ref}, #{content_type}, #{data})
